long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The journalling + coaching tool helping you do the thing most important to you.

How many times have we bought the book, signed up for the course or dreamed about quitting the 9-5 grind?

We all have a vision of what life might be. When we find the energy pursue our big ambition, we often find ourselves alone, filled with self-doubt, wondering if this might only ever be something we dream about.

37SevenEight is for those people who are saying this time it's going to be different!

The chrome extension acts as an accountability buddy, keeping that thing you most want in front of you.

Using two simple journal prompts, what have you done? And what will you do? The tool encourages daily reflection and intention setting that is proven to help build momentum and progress towards goals.

The witness feature is a wonderful way to be seen and celebrated by those that motivate you. Use it to add a friend, partner or coach so that they are notified whenever you complete a reflection.

I hope you get as much value from this tool as I have. Please reach out if you have any questions or feedback.

- Ray

---
Information about the extension:
The chrome extension displays the 37.78 prompt cards when you open a new tab in your browser. Data is stored locally and is not sold to anyone. You can use the extension with or without an internet connection.
